properties.name: Walgreens – Lake City (14352 Lake City Way NE)
properties.notes: Closure announced in local reporting Oct 21, 2023; store subsequently closed in November 2023.
properties.sources: Shoreline Area News 2023-10-21; Yelp listing shows CLOSED; MapQuest listing shows Permanently closed

properties.name: Fred Meyer – Lake City
properties.notes: Full-line supermarket with pharmacy; closed October 2025
